    OrderUI.manageOrderOptions​(OrderManager orders, ReservationManager reservations, StaffManager staff, Menu menu, ReportManager reports, TableManager tables)
    Displays the options under the 'Order Manager' option, namely to create an order, cancel an order and clear table, add items to an order, remove items from an order, view an order, and print an invoice.
    static void
    ReservationUI.manageReservationOptions​(ReservationManager reserve, OrderManager orders, StaffManager staffs, TableManager tables)
    Displays the options under the 'Reservation Manager' option, namely to make a booking reservation, reserve a table for walk‐in dining, remove a reservation, print a reservation, update a reservation, and print all reservations.
    static void
    TableUI.manageTableOptions​(TableManager tables, ReservationManager reservations)
    Displays the options under the 'Order Manager' option, namely to find an available table for a group, list occupied tables, list reserved tables, list available (in other words, unoccupied) tables, and list all tables.
    static void
    OrderUI.printInvoice​(OrderManager orders, ReportManager reports, ReservationManager reservations, TableManager tables, Menu menu)
    Prints the invoice of an order.
    static void
    ReservationUI.walkinReservation​(ReservationManager reserve, int contactNum, OrderManager orders, StaffManager staffs, TableManager tables)
